color_palette.extracted_from: Product images - Purple & Pink gradient draped tulle dress with iridescent silver accents

analysis.primary_tones: Soft lavender purple dominates the dress fabric
analysis.secondary_tones: Rose pink gradient creates feminine ombre effect
analysis.accent_tones: Holographic silver on straps adds luxury premium feel
analysis.background: Clean white base enhances the ethereal tulle quality

psychographics: Seeks unique, statement pieces for special occasions
Influenced by social media fashion trends
Willing to invest in standout wardrobe pieces

implementation_notes.color_usage: Primary purple for main CTAs and brand elements, secondary pink for accents and highlights, gradient for hero sections and premium features
implementation_notes.svg_styling: All icons designed with organic curves and asymmetry to avoid AI-generated appearance. Use currentColor for easy theming.
implementation_notes.accessibility: All color combinations tested for WCAG AA compliance (4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum)
implementation_notes.responsive_approach: Mobile-first design with fluid typography and spacing scales
implementation_notes.animation_philosophy: Smooth, elegant transitions that enhance premium feel without overwhelming user
